data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Uyeno, Daisuke (2015): Systematic revision of the pennellid genus Creopelates Shiino, 1958 (Copepoda: Siphonostomatoida) and the proposal of a new genus. Zootaxa 3904 (3): 359-386, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3904.3.3
